Text.Page:
Psssst! Hey you! I need a favor. I'm undercover. Can you tell? But I'm running out of good disguises.

Will you get me some clothing from those {@LinkCreature:40#2#berserk puppets} and {@LinkCreature:40#10#lunatic workers}? I can make them into great disguises!

And you won't mention this to Narpa, right?
Wait until you see the disguises I'll make with these! Our little secret, right? Thanks, friend!
Pssssst! Did you get me that clothing yet from the {@LinkCreature:40#2#berserk puppets} and {@LinkCreature:40#10#lunatic workers}? I really need it!
